meanings.definition: A substance added to paint to increase its coverage.
meanings.sent1: The painter used an extender to make the paint cover the wall better.
meanings.sent2: I bought an extender to help me finish painting the room faster.
meanings.sent3: The extender in the paint made it seem like magic as it spread across the surface.
meanings.sent4: The extender worked like a superhero cape, making the paint reach further than expected.
meanings.sent5: With the extender, the paint transformed the room with just a few strokes.

meanings.definition: A device used to increase the range of a wireless signal.
meanings.sent1: The wifi extender helped boost the signal in the far corners of the house.
meanings.sent2: I set up the extender to improve the internet connection in my room.
meanings.sent3: The extender played the role of a signal magician, making the wifi reach every corner.
meanings.sent4: The extender acted like a lighthouse, guiding the wifi signal to distant devices.
meanings.sent5: Thanks to the extender, I could now stream movies without any interruptions.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that extends something in length or duration.
meanings.sent1: As a time extender, she always found ways to make the day feel longer.
meanings.sent2: The bridge acted as an extender, connecting the two sides of the river.
meanings.sent3: The extender of the meeting was the person who kept telling jokes and making it last.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an extender, stretching the joy of the moment.
meanings.sent5: The extender of the story added more details, making it even more interesting.
